name: Berserk
description: Recovers all lost Health continually for 8 seconds. When the effect ends you suffer Berserk Crash and all recovered Health is lost again. Various mechanics can prevent or reduce Health lost from Berserk Crash. This power's cooldown time cannot be modified. Note: This ability will replace the Bloodthirst Minotaur Racial Power. This attack can be instantly Flash-Cast.
